name: Pineapple Mode
description: Make any website better by adding pineapples

config.markdown:
## MANUAL STEP NOTICE: This app needs to injects code into your website through posthog-js. You need to **opt-in** on your site to enable this behaviour.

```
posthog.init("api_key", {
  "api_host": "https://app.posthog.com",
  "opt_in_site_apps": true,
})
```

config.name: Domains
config.hint: Comma separated list of domains to activate on. Leave blank to enable all. For example: "localhost,app.posthog.com"

config.name: Show Floating Button
config.hint: Shows a button you can use to disable the pineapple mode

config.name: Button text color
config.hint: Any valid CSS color. For example: "#ff0000" or "red"

config.name: Button background
config.hint: Any valid CSS background. For example: "red" or "url('...')"
